messages.content: Chat started. Customer: Priya Sharma
Hi, my UPI payment is stuck since 30 minutes
Hello Priya! I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check this for you. Can you share the UPI transaction ID?
The transaction ID is UPI2026010412345
Thank you. I can see the transaction is in pending status. It should auto-resolve in 30 minutes. May I have your registered mobile number to send you an update?
Perfect. I've noted your number. If not resolved in 30 mins, we'll call you.
Transaction UPI2026010412345 auto-resolved - SUCCESS
Good news! Your transaction just got completed successfully. Please check your bank app.
Yes! I got the confirmation. Thank you so much!
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?
No that's all. Thanks again!
Chat ended. Duration: 7.5 minutes
Chat started. Customer: Rajesh Kumar
URGENT: I got a fraud call asking for OTP
I understand this is urgent. Did you share any OTP with the caller?
No I didn't share anything. But they knew my card number ending 3456
Good that you didn't share OTP. We never call asking for OTP. Let me immediately secure your account.
Please do. My account number is 50100123456789 at HDFC
I'm placing a temporary block on your card. You can verify your identity and unblock from app.
The caller's number was +91-7890123456. Can you report them?
Absolutely. I'm escalating this to our fraud team with the caller's number.
Card ending 3456 blocked successfully
Your card is now blocked. To unblock, use app verification or visit branch with ID proof.
Thanks for the quick action. Should I file a police complaint?
Yes, I recommend filing a complaint at cybercrime.gov.in. Our fraud team will also assist.
Okay will do. Thanks for your help.
Chat ended. Escalated to Fraud Team.
Chat started via WhatsApp. Customer: Ananya Reddy
My video KYC keeps failing. Error says camera not detected
Hello Ananya! Let me help you with the video KYC. Are you using the mobile app or web browser?
Using the app on my iPhone
Please check if camera permission is enabled. Go to Settings > Privacy > Camera > [Our App]
Oh! It was disabled. Enabled now. Let me try again
Camera is working now but liveness check is failing
For liveness check, please ensure: 1) Good lighting on face 2) No glasses 3) Face the camera directly 4) Blink when prompted
Trying now... still failing. My PAN is DERAR3456D, can you check if there's account issue?
Checking your account... I see 3 failed attempts today. Let me reset the counter for you.
KYC attempt counter reset for customer CUST-45680
Done! Please try again in 5 minutes. Also try in natural daylight near a window.
IT WORKED! Video KYC completed successfully!
Wonderful! Your KYC is now pending verification. Should be approved within 30 minutes.
Thank you so much Vikram!
Chat ended. Duration: 20 minutes
Chat started. Customer: Karthik Iyer
Where is my refund? It's been 10 days
Hello Karthik! I apologize for the delay. Can you share the order/transaction ID?
Order ORD-2025-789012. Cancelled on 26th December
Let me check this... I can see the refund was initiated on 27th Dec. It should have been processed by now.
The refund was for Rs 15,000. My bank account is 1234567890 at SBI Koramangala branch SBIN0001234
I see the issue - there was a bank holiday period. The refund is in queue for today's NEFT batch.
That's what you said 3 days ago also!
I completely understand your frustration. Let me escalate this to our payments team right now.
Escalation created: ESC-REF-2026-0456
